CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId='0124A000001UU1i', IF( AND(Account__r.Auto_Approval_Not_Applicable__c = FALSE, NOT(ISBLANK( Marketing_Video_Auto_Approval_Date__c))), IF( (DATETIMEVALUE( Marketing_Video_Auto_Approval_Date__c) - NOW()) > -0.70 , TEXT( FLOOR( (DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Video_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '17:00:00') - NOW())) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD((DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Video_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '17:00:00') - NOW()) * 24, 24 ) )) & " hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(Marketing_Video_Auto_Approval_Date__c) + " " + '17:00:00') - NOW()) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes", TEXT(Status__c) ), IF(Account__r.Auto_Approval_Not_Applicable__c = TRUE, "No Auto-Approval Process", " " )) ,"0")
CustomField.label: Marketing Collateral Video Countdown
